title: Drawing, Cloudy  Evening Sky Over a Hill Range, July 1866
title_raw: Cloudy  Evening Sky Over a Hill Range
inscribed:
Recto: Inscribed in graphite with figures and throughout: purp[le] / Dark purp / 3 smoky yellow green 2 beautiful deep rich rose tint / 4 clearer blue; and dated at top right [?].
Verso: Inscribed in graphite with figures and throughout: silver reflection / cool / 2 blue sky / 3 brilliant golden orange; at upper right: Grand sky evening / looking north thundery / milky central with a pinkish / glow; and dated beneath the center of the right edge: July 66.
description:
Recto:  Horizontal view of a cloudy sky seen over a range of hills
Verso:  Horizontal view of cloudy sky seen over hill tops with a group of trees growing upon the one at left.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Cloudy  Evening Sky Over a Hill Range, July 1866. Graphite on cream-colored paper. 
Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-160.
